mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_acct = #{userAcct}, id_card = #{idCard}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{mail}, user_image = #{imagePath}, user_pwd = #{userPassword}, role = #{role}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{userId} and version = #{version}

mapper.select: select user_code userId, user_name userName, user_acct userAcct, user_image userImage, user_pwd userPassword, id_card idCard, role role, sex sex, phone phone, email mail, version version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0

select a.user_code userId, a.user_name userName, a.user_acct userAcct, a.id_card idCard, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.role role, a.email mail, a.version from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.role like concat('%', #{role}, '%')
order by a.gmt_create desc
